channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Eric Knowles is in the saddle for today's show from Bath Racecourse. Galloping around the fair with the reds and blues are experts Stephanie Connell and Raj Bisram. Eric talks jewellery with expert Izzie Balmer to find out the latest trends and what to look out for at fairs and auctions.
